items.name: XML Sitemap Generator
items.info: Site requests to sitemap.xml and individual sitemap pages will be handled and generated by the plugin.

items.name: Multi-lingual and multi-regional sitemaps
items.info: Manage sitemaps on a per-Site basis or using Craft's Site Groups.

items.name: Large Sitemap Support
items.info: Limit the number of items that display on each page of your sitemap and the sitemap generator will handle the pagination.

items.name: Unlimited Custom Pages
items.info: Enable Custom Pages to add additional pages to your sitemap.

items.name: Unlimited Custom Query Sitemaps
items.info: Build custom sitemaps using Craft's Condition Builder. For example, you could create sitemap metadata that includes or exclude a specific Entry Type.

items.name: Unlimited Content Sitemaps
items.info: Lite users can create a total of 5 Content and Content Query Sitemaps per Site.

items.name: Entry Element support
items.info: Add Singles, Channels, and Structures to your sitemaps.

items.name: Craft Commerce Product Element support
items.info: Product Element Sitemap Metadata will appear as an option when Craft Commerce is installed.

items.name: Custom Sitemap Metadata API
items.info: Add support for additional content defined by custom Elements.
